description: This notification is generated when DHCP client has found network-side DHCP server or finding timeout.

Summary.eval: ($v5==0) ? 'DHCP simulation is successful' : (($v5==6921510) ? 'DHCP simulation failed due to timeout' : 'DHCP simulation in progress')

tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltResultTrap HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltRequestID i 9999 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltIndex i 1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltServicePortId i 9999 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltOverTime i 5 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltResult u 6921510 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltStartTime s EXAMPLEE HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltEndTime s EXAMPLEE HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltUserIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltSubNetMask a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltDhcpServerIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltDnsServerIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltDnsServerName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltSecondaryDnsServerIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltGatewayIp a 192.0.2.1

$SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltResultTrap HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltRequestID i 9999 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltIndex i 1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltServicePortId i 9999 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltOverTime i 5 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltResult u 0 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltStartTime s EXAMPLEE HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltEndTime s EXAMPLEE HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltUserIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltSubNetMask a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltDhcpServerIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltDnsServerIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltDnsServerName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltSecondaryDnsServerIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltGatewayIp a 192.0.2.1

$SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltResultTrap HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltRequestID i 9999 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltIndex i 1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltServicePortId i 9999 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltOverTime i 5 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltResult u 6921509 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltStartTime s EXAMPLEE HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltEndTime s EXAMPLEE HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltUserIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltSubNetMask a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltDhcpServerIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltDnsServerIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltDnsServerName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltSecondaryDnsServerIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltGatewayIp a 192.0.2.1

description: The Request ID of DHCP simulation.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltRequestID

description: Indicates the index of a simulation user.
Range: 1-255
Currently, the system supports only one simulation user.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltIndex

description: Indicates the index of the service port.
The service port index here is 1 greater than the service port index queried through the CLI.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltServicePortId

description: Indicates the simulation timeout time.
Range: 5-60
Default: 5
Unit: second
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltOverTime

description: Indicates the DHCP simulation result.
0: Indicates that the DHCP simulation is successful.
6921509: Indicates the DHCP simulation is being performed.
6921510: Indicates that the DHCP simulation fails due to timeout.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltResult

description: Indicates the start time of the DHCP simulation.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltStartTime

description: Indicates the end time of the DHCP simulation.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltEndTime

description: Indicates the IP address obtained by the DHCP client.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltUserIp

description: Indicates the subnet mask of the IP address obtained by the DHCP client.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltSubNetMask

description: Indicates the IP address of the DHCP server.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltDhcpServerIp

description: Indicates the IP address of the primary DNS server.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltDnsServerIp

description: Indicates the name of the DNS server.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltDnsServerName

description: Indicates the IP address of the secondary DNS server.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltSecondaryDnsServerIp

description: Indicates the IP address of the gateway.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpSmltGatewayIp

description: This notification is generated when an IP address got by DHCP client for the interface
conflicted with those assigned to other interfaces.
Indicates the corresponding VLAN ID of a VLAN interface.
variables.name: HUAWEI-VLAN-MIB::hwVlanID

description: The conflicting IP address got by DHCP.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpConfilctIpAddress

description: The sub net mask of the conflicting IP address got by DHCP.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DHCP-PROXY-MIB::hwDhcpConfilctIpAddressMask
